original_text: One of you will say to me: “Then why does God still blame us? For who is able to resist his will?”
korean_text: 혹 네가 내게 말하기를 그러면 하나님이 어찌하여 허물하시느냐 누가 그 뜻을 대적하느냐 하리니

sentences.original_text: One of you will say to me:
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 한 사람이 내게 말할 것이다:

sentences.original_text: Then why does God still blame us?
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님은 왜 여전히 우리를 탓하시는가?

sentences.original_text: For who is able to resist his will?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 그의 뜻을 거역할 수 있겠는가?
